mapper.insert: insert into umsystem (SYSTEMID, SYSCODE, SYSNAME, CONTEXTS, SSOPAGE, MEMO, `STATUS`, SHOWORDER, COSYS, EXTPROP, FRAMESETCODE, SERVICEADDR, `HOST`, del_flag) values (#{systemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contexts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssopage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cosys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extprop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{framesetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update umsystem set SYSCODE = #{syscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSNAME = #{sysname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTEXTS = #{contexts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSOPAGE = #{ssopage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COSYS = #{cosys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTPROP = #{extprop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRAMESETCODE = #{framesetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICEADDR = #{serviceaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `HOST` = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where SYSTEMID = #{systemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SYSTEMID, SYSCODE, SYSNAME, CONTEXTS, SSOPAGE, MEMO, `STATUS`, SHOWORDER, COSYS, EXTPROP, FRAMESETCODE, SERVICEADDR, `HOST`, del_flag from umsystem where SYSTEMID = #{systemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SYSTEMID, SYSCODE, SYSNAME, CONTEXTS, SSOPAGE, MEMO, `STATUS`, SHOWORDER, COSYS, EXTPROP, FRAMESETCODE, SERVICEADDR, `HOST`, del_flag from umsystem
